Fieldbook report

Source: R/fieldbook_report.R
fieldbook_report.Rd

Function to create a complete report of the fieldbook

fieldbook_report(
  data,
  fb_smr,
  variable,
  model_facts,
  dotplot_groups = NULL,
  model_diag = FALSE
)

Arguments

data

Field book data.
fb_smr

Summary of the variables in the fieldbook.
variable

Response variable.
model_facts

Model used for the experimental design.
dotplot_groups

Factors to compare. See details.
model_diag

Diagnostic for model (default = FALSE).

Value

data frame

Details

For compare the factors you should use ":". For example, to compare treatment1 and treatment2: treatment1:treatment2.

Examples


# \donttest{

library(inti)
library(googlesheets4)

url <- paste0("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/"
              , "15r7ZwcZZHbEgltlF6gSFvCTFA-CFzVBWwg3mFlRyKPs/edit#gid=172957346")
# browseURL(url)
gs <- as_sheets_id(url)

(data <- gs %>%
    range_read("fb"))

#> Reading from "YUPANA"
#> Range "'fb'"
#> # A tibble: 150 x 17
#>    block treat genotype SPAD_29 SPAD_83 RWC_84 OP_84 LEAFDW STEMDW ROOTDW TUBDW
#>    <chr> <chr> <chr>      <dbl>   <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 II    DRG   G01         56.3    41.1   61.5 -2.43  13.3   14.9    3.83 19.8 
#>  2 IV    DRG   G02         52.7    47.9   63.2 -3.03   9.42   8.63   2.1  17.7 
#>  3 III   IRG   G01         49.2    41.6   67.7 -2.5   18.2   24.2    3.16 38.0 
#>  4 I     DRG   G02         55.5    44.2   64.9 -2.4    8.84   6.58   2    13.5 
#>  5 II    IRG   G03         58.2    32.6   74.5 -2.27  14.6   12.6    1.83 51.2 
#>  6 V     IRG   G04         43.5    37.8   74.0 -2.37  19.8   17.5    2.83 62.5 
#>  7 I     IRG   G01         57.4    42.5   72.7 -1.77  15.0   15.3    2.28 22.4 
#>  8 IV    IRG   G05         56.1    35.9   72.8 -2.33  19.9   14.6    3.65 51.4 
#>  9 II    DRG   G06         61      57.5   59.8 -3.23  19.9   21.2    4.04  2.37
#> 10 I     DRG   G05         60.3    41.8   50.8 -2.87  12.3   11.1    4.17 28.7 
#> # ... with 140 more rows, and 6 more variables: BIOMDW <dbl>, HI <dbl>,
#> #   TTRNS <dbl>, WUE <dbl>, TWUE <dbl>, LA <dbl>

(fb_smr <- gs %>%
  range_read("fbsm"))

#> Reading from "YUPANA"
#> Range "'fbsm'"
#> # A tibble: 17 x 8
#>    variables type   levels   NAs model_facts     comp_facts  test_comp sig_level
#>    <chr>     <chr>   <dbl> <dbl> <chr>           <chr>       <chr>         <dbl>
#>  1 block     factor      5    NA NA              NA          NA            NA   
#>  2 genotype  factor     15    NA NA              NA          NA            NA   
#>  3 treat     factor      2    NA NA              NA          NA            NA   
#>  4 BIOMDW    numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#>  5 HI        numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#>  6 LA        numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#>  7 LEAFDW    numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#>  8 OP_84     numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#>  9 ROOTDW    numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#> 10 RWC_84    numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#> 11 SPAD_29   numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#> 12 SPAD_83   numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#> 13 STEMDW    numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#> 14 TTRNS     numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#> 15 TUBDW     numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#> 16 TWUE      numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05
#> 17 WUE       numer~    150     0 block + genoty~ genotype:t~ TUKEY          0.05

report <- fieldbook_report(data
                          , fb_smr = fb_smr
                          , variable = "LA"
                          , dotplot_groups = "genotype"
                          , model_diag = TRUE
                          )

report

#> $formula
#> LA ~ block + genotype * treat
#> <environment: 0x00000000430f6760>
#> 
#> $anova
#> Call:
#>    aov(formula = model_formula, data = fb)
#> 
#> Terms:
#>                     block  genotype     treat genotype:treat Residuals
#> Sum of Squares    3435339 261729564 788556926      108147972  63797516
#> Deg. of Freedom         4        14         1             14       116
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 741.6054
#> Estimated effects may be unbalanced
#> 
#> $diagplot
#> $diagplot$freq
#> 
#> $diagplot$qqnorm
#> 
#> $diagplot$resid
#> 
#> $diagplot$sresid
#> 
#> 
#> $dotplot
#> 

# }
